CHAT.comment: Ari and Ken , but at first niether child is visible

u.a: <3w-7w> loud , high broad , with excited "wow" intonation <1w-2w> gruff
sits on floor by car , dials on telephone
stands at wall looking at ari

<20w-27w> subject not clear , but clear to ari <13w-19w> real conversation with pauses for response <10w-12w> gets number , big smile , very cordial tone , telephone gaze <1w-9w> dials very slowly , deliberately
Ken joins ari at car social affect , sympathy
gets in the act by replying
<aft> on opposite side of car from Ken , examines tools
opposite side of car from ari , more or less talks to himself < 24-33> but then tries to engage ari
<2w> has flashlight and is quite preoccupied with it
ari looks at Ken , they seem to be looking at each other
ari puts down flashlight , picks up pliers "reasonable" answer
reaches for flashlight and shakes it
goes back to door , stands by wall looking at ari who is interested in examining tools
ari glances at Ken <bef> comes over as response and puts hammer in belt , but immediately returns to door
looking at something on floor next to back of car
<5w-14w> begins to put tools under magnifying glass on stool at rear of car , looks to Ken for recognition
becomes interested and adopts imitative intonation and "doing same thing" Ken joins ari at stool
<now through next 4 turns> Ken and ari alternately share over stool
<now through next 4 turns> same contour followed by ari's giggle and new stimulus
pleased , gives Ken another prompt and makes a face into stool
holds out his hand for ari and himself to look at
goes back to door and stands there watching ari
tries again , gets out another tool , glances at Ken to see effect and repeats the formula with same intonation , it works
rejoins ari , and the two are sharing again , he grabs telephone and looks at it through the magnifier
hands hammer to Ken continuing the game
weaker and distorted but still much the same
gets up and gets snake , doesn't put it under stool , just tosses it as he speaks , a little over done , the game is almost over
runs over to snake , excited , picks it up , heads it at ari and approaches ari with snake
<1w-3w> makes suggestion <bef> screams twice and backs off
<1w-11w> "oh shucks" intonation , slightly whining <bef> remembers he's feeling bored and drops snake , goes to door
tries to engage Ken again with magnifier game
ari picks up snake and holds it on shoulder , throws it down
looks up from stool and addresses ari directly
hands in pockets , maybe a reply to ken's question "nothing to do"
gets very loud and picks up snake and pretends that he is afraid of snake and throws it down
Ken picks up snake and points it at ari
quieter , more reasonable , not quite what ari's attitude is , but not condescending
stutters and sits by cars with tools
decides to go along with pretend game
still holding snake , it's face close to his , he smiles
<bef> smiles at ari's command , points snake to back of car
temporarily disengages from ari , has tuck
picks up hammer and moves away from car with it
<aft> moves to hammer <1w> prompted by ken's previous action
Ken gives ari the hammer back
ari's ploy has worked trying another "play" approach calling out to Ken from a distancce
looks through stool , picking it up then leans on it
<1w-3w> sings <bef> sighs and climbs on to car
<aft> driving noise <1w-3w> sung like "the yanks are coming"
huffs and grunts , feels at leg , laughs , subsides on floor
looks up at Ken and watches while holding and suckin pliers
puts pliers to snake's mouth , throws snake down
comes and picks up snake , requests replay of what ari just did
picks up snake again and in quiet voice makes another suggestion , and whole set is repeated exactly
<5w-7w> but is deflected when he notices microphone
ari moves around car , not too interested in microphone
attracts ari's attention and also points
looks up and then jumps to see if he can reach it , he fails
starts to move car so he can stand on it to reach microphone
<12w> goesback to stand by wall <bef> watches ari and shakes his head
climbs up on car , but on his knees and listens to Ken and looks at him . the microphone is forgotten , he has flashlight in hand
Ken joins ari there , smiling broadly , puts hat under stool <bef> considers his answer while getting off car , then picks up flashlight , holds it under stool , resuming former game
Ken still smiling , reaches hand under
<aft> sticks snake under again looks for himself and shrieks
ari stands and doesn't answer ends the game , pulls back a little from stool
quiet , not too sad , not whining , straight forward
<aft> touches mike , looks to Ken and then back to mike <bef> wanders around , looks at toy picture , gets up on car , points mouth up at microphoe and speaks clearly , not loudly
ari gets off car , watches microphone , is now down on floor and tosses the flashlight lightly at bird speaks from floor watching ari
<bef> walks around car toward Ken , speaks then retrieves flashlight
<7w> comes to sit by Ken and snake retrieves dynamite again from couch and turns to throw it at snake on floor by ken
suggesting looking at snake through stool
moves stool slightly and suggests doing it again
pulls back a little as "Ken looks through
Ken turns from stool with snake
Ken picks up telephone , leaves it and goes across the room to couch as ari watches moves snake along floor
turns and tosses something back toward ari where snake is and stays with car
Ken watches , half interested as ari plays with snake picking up snake , moving it up wall .
makes hand into gun and shoots at approaching snake
close to Ken and car , said with direct gaze
cooperating , takes flashlight from ari and throws it like dynamite
<bef> reaches again for flashlight , tosses snake up
<bef> takes snake again and turns away
Ken shoots at airborne snake with gun/flashlight ari throws it in air
<3w-7w> suggests again but has no effect <2w> satisfied
<10w> takes screwdriver and flashlight/pistol from ari and shoots the snake
pursuing ken's idea about edge and explains to ken
responds but shoots anyway and continues shooting
leans over stool and truck , really not interested
next interchanges are closely linked tries again , showing excitement
<bef> watching , still ready to join him if possible
